column5: Glamper 7 is a 22 ft 1970's era camper updated to provide comfort along with the camper experience. There is bathroom with toilet, indoor and outdoor shower and sink. DISH TV with HBO, WiFi, coffee maker, microwave, Air Conditioning, gas grill and great views of Guadalupe River across the road. The is 350 ft of private frontage for guest use along with canoes and water gear. Located at Casita Blu cabins in Ingram.
